text: Ka ce: "Wane abu ne mafi girma ga shaida?" Ka ce: "Allah ne shaida a tsakanina da tsakaninku. Kuma an yiwo wahayin wannan Alƙur'ani domin in yi muku gargaɗi da shi, da wanda labari ya kai gare shi. Shin lalle ne ku, haƙiƙa, kuna shaidar cewa, lalle ne tare da Allah akwai wasu abubuwan bautawa?" Ka ce: "Ba zan yi shaidar (haka) ba." Ka ce: "Abin sani, Shi ne Abin bautawa Guda kuma lalle ne ni barrantacce ne daga abin da kuke yi na shirki
